price: If you ask them who created them[33], they will surely say, “Allah.” How are they then deluded?
arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَهُمۡ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ يُؤۡفَكُونَ
footnotes: [33] i.e., those who associate partners with Allah.
